name: d3-scale-chromatic
description: Sequential, diverging and categorical color schemes.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" dist/d3-scale-chromatic.js -c -m -o dist/d3-scale-chromatic.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-scale-chromatic/dist/d3-scale-chromatic.js d3-scale-chromatic.v1.js && cp ../d3-scale-chromatic/dist/d3-scale-chromatic.min.js d3-scale-chromatic.v1.min.js && git add d3-scale-chromatic.v1.js d3-scale-chromatic.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-scale-chromatic ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j dist/d3-scale-chromatic.zip -- LICENSE README.md dist/d3-scale-chromatic.js dist/d3-scale-chromatic.min.js
